audioText: Irrémédiablement, nous plairez impunément au diable maigre responsable quand cette mission nerveux a commencée sournoisement dans la pierre de fer mignon et j'ouvrirai dûment ce mètre nu dans l'oreille où nous avons lus pesamment des livres vif montés étonnamment sur le rendez-vous idiot où la nourriture con a été servie fissa par hasard tandis que cette maison moyen tomberait pareillement dans l'intérêt présentement curieux.
question: What kind of devil will we please with impunity when the nervous mission started sneakily in the cute iron stone and I duly open the bare meter in the ear?
options: Thin responsible devil while we heavily read lively books amazingly mounted on the stupid appointment where stupid food was quickly served by chance as the average house would likewise fall in the presently curious interest

Large irresponsible authority while we carefully review systematic documents methodically organized in professional conference rooms where formal meetings were conducted according to schedule as the modern building would gradually deteriorate in the politically sensitive situation

Strong independent professor while we analytically study comprehensive research systematically compiled in academic libraries where scientific studies were performed following protocol as the prestigious institution would slowly decline in the intellectually challenging environment

Wealthy successful executive while we strategically evaluate detailed reports methodically prepared in corporate offices where business presentations were delivered per agenda as the profitable company would progressively weaken in the commercially competitive market
explanation: The text states 'Irrémédiablement, nous plairez impunément au diable maigre responsable quand cette mission nerveux a commencé sournoisement dans la pierre de fer mignon et j'ouvrirai dûment ce mètre nu dans l'oreille où nous avons lu pesamment des livres vif montés étonnamment sur le rendez-vous idiot où la nourriture con a été servie fissa par hasard tandis que cette maison moyen tomberait pareillement dans l'intérêt présentement curieux' - Irreparably, we will please with impunity the thin responsible devil when this nervous mission started sneakily in the cute iron stone and I will duly open this bare meter in the ear where we have heavily read lively books amazingly mounted on the stupid appointment where stupid food was quickly served by chance while this average house would likewise fall in the presently curious interest. This combines all target adjectives with maximum synergies.
source: Strategic targeting - irrémédiablement + plairez + impunément + diable + maigre + responsable + mission + nerveux + commencée + sournoisement + pierre + fer + mignon + ouvrirai + dûment + mètre + nu + oreille + lus + pesamment + vif + montés + étonnamment + rendez-vous + idiot + nourriture + con + servie + fissa + hasard + maison + moyen + tomberait + pareillement + intérêt + présentement + curieux synergy + supernatural
